meanings.definition: A person or thing that remails.
meanings.sent1: The remailers in the office always make sure the mail reaches the right person.
meanings.sent2: I heard the remailers are working overtime to deliver all the packages on time.
meanings.sent3: The remailers at the post office are like mail superheroes, ensuring every letter finds its way home.
meanings.sent4: The remailers in the sorting room are like silent guardians, guiding each package to its destination.
meanings.sent5: The remailers, with their efficient work, are the unsung heroes of the postal service.

meanings.definition: A service that forwards email messages anonymously.
meanings.sent1: Using remailers can help protect your identity when sending emails.
meanings.sent2: Many people rely on remailers to keep their email communications private.
meanings.sent3: The remailers online are like secret messengers, ensuring your emails stay confidential.
meanings.sent4: Remailers act as invisible couriers, delivering messages without revealing the sender.
meanings.sent5: With remailers, your emails can travel discreetly through the digital world.

meanings.definition: The act of sending email messages anonymously.
meanings.sent1: Anonymity is crucial when using remailers to send sensitive emails.
meanings.sent2: The remailers service allows users to send emails without disclosing their identity.
meanings.sent3: Using remailers feels like sending messages into a digital void, where only the recipient knows the sender.
meanings.sent4: Remailers cloak your identity like a digital mask, ensuring your emails remain anonymous.
meanings.sent5: With remailers, you can communicate incognito, protecting your privacy online.
